:exclamation::exclamation:W A R N I N G:exclamation::exclamation:

I really hate mondays. But even on days like these, I really enjoy drinking some water at this hour. :potable_water:

You'd better do it as well!

<@&572540171678121984>

:exclamation::exclamation:W A R N I N G:exclamation::exclamation:

It's real water hours. :potable_water:

Take a glass of water as fast as possible!

:exclamation::exclamation:W A R N I N G:exclamation::exclamation:

Why, yes, it's real water hours. :potable_water:

Humble men like me like having a sip at this hour of the day.
